titleStmt.title: The prologue and epilogue to the city politicks
titleStmt.author: Crown, Mr. (John), 1640?-1712.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Crowne by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
This item appears at reels 885:13 and 1483:5.
Wing number B5068A cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of originals in Harvard University Library and Huntington Library .
